vsParam:
Hmmmmm... Why, why does no one understand me!
This is a terrific research!
Uh... I think it's time for you to give up, uncle?

No! I'll never give up! The door to the future
will not close as long as I persist!

Where exactly does it go wrong?
Here! Or here?

H-Hazel.
What happened to Silver Birch Sensei?

My uncle... His application for a research grant was rejected
again and he's racking his brain to make modifications.

He changed the application 5 times to no avail.
But he just won't give up.

How can I give up after just 5 failures, Hazel!
Failure is the mother of success!

I'd make a 6th try after the 5th failure, an 11th try if the 10th also fails.
I'd even try 101 times if I fail 100 times!!

I think it's pointless to just make cosmetic changes...
Why don't you try to lower your cost?

No, the cost can't go down anymore!
I can't make it with 1 Cole less!
I guess he'll have to pay it by himself, right?
Right? I don't what to do now...
He wouldn't make such a fuss if he has that money...

Ah, right! We could do this!
I don't know why I didn't think of it sooner!

Uh, what, what?
You got any good idea!?

Yeah. I have no funds, but I can take it from somewhere
with enough funds. It means—

My shortage of funds will be covered by
the Student Union!

Huh—!? Wh-what are you thinking, uncle!
This can't work!

No, this should be easy for you,
Miss President, right?

Ha ha ha! How's that? It's a wonderful idea, huh?
I was shortsighted. How could I not think of this earlier?

Are you listening to me!?
This is not the problem, OK!?
And the Student Union does not have extra funds!

That's good. Let me make a new budget sheet based on this!
In this way, there will be extra funds here, and here...

Wait a minute, uncle!? Hold on!
I can't allow it!

Putting Hazel in such a difficult position...
That's really Silver Birch Sensei...
